title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-15.3 - Requests for additional time to submit documentation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-15.3 - Requests for additional time to submit documentation

State Regulations

Upon written request from an assessing unit, and upon good
cause shown, ORPTS may allow an additional period of time from the expiration
of the time period provided in section
8186-15.2
(a) of this Subpart. Such written request must be received by ORPTS prior to the
deadline for submission of the complaint form and supporting documentation. For
purposes of this subdivision, good cause shown shall include extraordinary
unforeseen and unavoidable circumstances that have arisen subsequent to the
establishment of the tentative rate or ratios. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-15.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
